name: Deeper Than You Think(LD48)
description:
Hey, guys this is my submission for LD48.

This game is Deeper than you think and it's not that easy to not drown.

I've added timer for more competetive look, you can try speedrun this game, it take me only 6:41 to win it so good luck. xD

Soon i'm gonna make youtube video out of makeing process.

I'm working on bigger project "RubyHunt" you can check out devlogs on my youtube channel.
